content.question: Why is the unemployment rate an imperfect measure of joblessness?

choices.label: It includes workers who are on strike.
It does not include the number of underemployed workers.
It overestimates the number of individuals who are self-employed.

content.answer: It does not include the number of underemployed workers.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
